website_summaries.verdict: This cooling, color safe shampoo and conditioner set is designed to revive dull hair.
pros: Complete with nourishing oils, this duo will help your hair feel strong and smooth
Conditioner promotes smooth and sleek hair
cons: Some felt that the combination made their hair feel dry

customer_reviews.title: Still damaging
customer_reviews.text: So the bottle says sulfate free, but it has like 5 different kinds of salts in it, which are just as damaging. I have been trying different sulfate free shampoos and this is the worst one I've used. The conditioner is fine. I think it's trying to make up for the fact that the shampoo strips your scalp from all its natural and healthy oils. I bought this because it was a lighting deal. Never again. I'll go back to getting my climatologist friend's advice before buying a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Ale.mom.91

customer_reviews.title: Soft healthy hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is my hair after using the shampoo, conditioner and blow dry. I’m suprised how smooth this has made my hair. Usually I have to flat iron it to get it to look like this. It feels so soft and healthy! Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kari demes

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic and feels good.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the smell of this product. I bought the peppermint product for my daughter who was going away to Girl Scout camp. Peppermint detracts mosquitoes and ticks. When she got back from camp, I used the rest of the bottles because I like the smell so much. The shampoo is VERY good at cleaning hair and will leave your hair smelling good and squeaky-clean but also needing the very effective conditioner. It's the kind of conditioner you put in and brush through and then your hair is silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry. A full price review
customer_reviews.text: I am so sorry to be unhappy with this product, but for me it didn't work. I have fine, curly hair, although I have a lot of it, and this prduct did not dequately moisturize my hair without weighing it down. The smapoo was, for me, nothing special, and after two uses I relegated it to the guest bathroom. I would hope others do better than I did, but for me, this was a no go. I paid full price for this item, so this is a non biased review. If this review did help you, please click "yes" below.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie DeCesarisTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: No more oily hair. Mint lovers heaven
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shampoo I have ever used! If you have oily hair this product is the best for you. It’s natural and chemical free and gives off a very minty smell. The shampoo gets ride of all oil and the conditioner actually moisturizes your hair without leaving it oily! I only wash my hair twice a week and this produce has been a life changer, I only wish I found this sooner. If they made a grapefruit or any citrus scent I’d be all over it. If your hair is on the more dry side, wait until your scalp is a little oily for best results.
customer_reviews.author: sophie miller

customer_reviews.title: Removes Dirt and Oil Without Damaging Your Hair
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different shampoos and conditioners in an attempt to manage thin, oily and damaged hair and while most do work fairly well in removing the dirt, they leave my hair feeling dry, damaged, and lacking any sort of volume. Thankfully, this Natural Mint Shampoo and Conditioner Set leaves my hair feeling soft and clean with plenty of volume. While the bottles are small, a little (quarter size) goes a long way and is plenty for shoulder length hair. The fresh, minty smell is very refreshing and clean. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a good clean while also offering a balanced level of conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: James Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Organic invigorating-scented product that weighs thin hair down,even after drying.
customer_reviews.text: Positive aspects of this product: The scent, which is derived from essential oils, is invigorating, It is an organic product, the bottles are a compact size, the labelling is aesthetic, the product is long-lasting. Negative aspwcts of this product: The consistency of both the shampoo & conditioner are SO thick that it leaves my thin hair oily,my hair is weighted down even after it is dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Calzadilla

customer_reviews.title: So wonderful - a very pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo lathers up more than anything I have ever used in my life. if you don't feel instant lather then your hair needs to have more water on it to start with! I have below shoulder-length hair so I have to work the conditioner in with my fingers and the tangles give up within 2 seconds. One more thing that is important, washing my hair has also become a relaxing aromatherapy routine since the shampoo & conditioner have a wonderful light scent! I probably leave it on my hair longer than I need to because I enjoy the aroma. I started using this shampoo in January of 2020 & use the Winter Blend & the Sage.
customer_reviews.author: Naturelover

customer_reviews.title: Bad shampoo, good conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading all the reviews and was quite disappointed. The shampoo makes my already frizzy and fragile hair far worse than any other shampoo. My hair feels so rough after a wash, I can barely bring myself to touch my hair with my fingers. The conditioner does its job, my hair feels a bit more like human hair but I wouldnt recommend the shampoo at all. It felt like as if my hair had been stripped off all its layers. I've used shampoos that do not feel like my hair has been through hell and back, this surely was an exception and very surprising given all the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Razorboyzmom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!!
customer_reviews.text: after doing cold caps a few months ago and now winter my scalp got very dry, I have been using some natural shampoos with good results but it was getting a little to expensive, so I was looking for something more affordable and I found this shampoo and conditioner..... all I can say is WOW!!! I washed my hair this morning for the first time and it feels so good and very very shiny .... we will seee how it works after a few washes but I am very impressed with this product.... I highly recommend it! Give it a try !!!
customer_reviews.author: angecid

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo & conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: Every 3 months I receive shots for migraines. I recently started having hair loss in the injection spots. I did some research & ran across this company & tried the Maple Holistics Winter Blend! Wow, does this product smell great! I've been using it for a couple of months now & my hair loss spots appear to be growing hair again. I've always had frizzy long straight hair & this product takes the frizz right out of my hair leaving it smelling, feeling & looking amazing! I love this shampoo & conditioner! Definitely a recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: made things worse
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo dried out my hair and made my scape itch. I also have this in the Tree Tea oil and it does not have that effect. I also thought the mint would have more of a cooling effect on my scape when using but that is not the case. It does somewhat but not what I expected. This shampoo and conditioner did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: kdo

customer_reviews.title: Great company, Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because I wanted a cooling effect like I've experienced from a few other minty shampoos. I was not disappointed. I also really like that it is a natural formula that is easy to work with. Some natural shampoos don't lather up well, but this does. The minty scent is light and pleasant, and stays for a decent bit. I've even gotten compliments from passerby! I will give full disclosure that the company sent a free product offer to my house for leaving a review. I can appreciate that they appreciate my feedback. I will be trying more of their product lines!
customer_reviews.author: Terah

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo  and conditioner,  but bottle is hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the shampoo and conditioner. they do a good job and smell nice. But the bottle is not easy to use. it is hard to get the product out of the bottles without having to unscrew the cap. Also, I cant read without my glasses which I do not have on in the shower. The writing is so small and the the bottles look the same so I have trouble seeing which is shampoo and which is conditioner. I put a hair band around shampoo, but I do like when the bottles look a bit different.
customer_reviews.author: OMEvans

customer_reviews.title: Yuk
customer_reviews.text: Stripped my hair of everything so I guess it cleans well. Not a lot of lather. The conditioner was not adequate. Hair was not soft and smooth after use. Smells like toothpaste. Thought I’d be getting a better product for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have friends that love this set, and this brand, so figured I should try it. Did not work AT ALL for me, my 2 friends that love this have very short hair, this is not good for this very thick long hair lady. This doesn't sud up or lather well, felt like I had to use A LOT of both the shampoo and conditioner, to the point where I let my BF have them because I would use up both bottles in a few washes. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance and give your hair a rough coarse Sandy Beach feel
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo does not wash your hair properly and it very harsh and leave your hair feeling like you just got out the beach. It sucks all the moisturizer out my hair when other shampoo is more gentle. The conditioner is very weak in strength and will not keep your hair feeling soft or smooth after shower. It a very rough and coarse feeling. All these natural oils are apparently probably false cause my hair feel terrible. And the mint feeling does not give you a tingling sensation at all. Severely dissapointed and want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Quang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Made my dandruff worse and my head itchier
customer_reviews.text: I had previously used the tea tree shampoo and conditioner combo - which seemed to help a little with my dandruff problems and made my hair silky and soft. It at least didn't seem to make it worse. I used the Winter shampoo and conditioner set and it's been awful! I'm wondering if I didn't misjudge the tea tree oil combo too, because it might have been doing damage before I noticed. My head is so itchy all of the time now and the dandruff is really awful - even right after I wash. I'm going to try another shampoo for a while and see how it does.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Made my scalp itchy
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try maple holistics degrease shampoo because I have an oily scalp and wanted a sulfate free shampoo. It made my scalp itchy and dried out my hair. So I decided to order this set instead to see if maybe it was more moisturizing. Well this set made my scalp itch more. I noticed the ingredients contain a lot of salts. So this could be a problem with sensitive scalps. I always used Dove dandruff shampoo with no problems but wanted to steer away from sulfates. Guess I’ll stick to sulfates for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Suling

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and cool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it based on the fact that I have long fine hair that tangles very easily. This shampoo/conditioner set does the trick! Forest, it smells amazing. Leaves my hair soft and silky. I do recommend following directions in leaving it in for a few minutes before rinsing! That’s the key, I think. BUT it’s my DH that really ended up loving it. He got excited when I said I was going to write a review. He said, oh yeah, that is great shampoo! It leaves my scalp feeling fresh and cool, really nice in the summertime. It really leaves his hair and scalp clean, he says. He also reports that his hair feels thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Book Diva

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set! As someone who suffers from dandruff and redness, especially in the winter months, I am picky about the products I put in my hair. I also have straight, fine hair that gets easily weighed down. Not with this! The smell is to die for and my hair is always incredibly soft and light. I always get compliments from hair dressers when I go in for a cut. This product soothes any itches or redness I have, too. Not only does it not contribute to irritation, it makes it better. While the bottles are tiny, I find that a little goes a long way and buy this set about two-three times a year at most.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Bonollo

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set when switching to haircare that was more clean, without harsh chemical ingredients. I found it very soothing, the scent was refreshing and it made my fine, wavy hair very shiny and healthy. I wash my hair every other day and color it about every 12 weeks and I found this to be gentle and non-stripping. I would definitely recommend to others and will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA OLIVER

customer_reviews.title: Love the Peppermint Winter Shampoo & Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I've been impressed with Maple Holistics. They are my go to for hair products now. I have fine textured hair and their products do not weigh it down. I truly enjoy the Natural Mint products! The mint is natural and light - no fragrance (perfume!). I'm smell sensitive and can't use many products because of that. It does contain aloe for those who have allergies to aloe. Luckily I have not reacted to it, perhaps the quality of it makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing, with an amazing scent
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner is a great, more natural line that what I was previously using. I have curly hair and moisture is a curly girl's best friend. I have not yet found a co-wash that is natural, but this shampoo and conditioner works to clean my hair without over-processing it. It smells amazing any time of year, but especially in the winter. It never dried my hair out. I plan to try other products from Maple Holistics as I think the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the shampoo and conditioner. I used the shampoo as directed but the conditioner had no directions at all, so I used it like I would regularly use a conditioner. Package arrived damaged, although it was not such a big one. The little protection inside the conditioner bottle was a little opened and that’s why the package arrived a little messy. Nothing serious so I kept the product and used it right away. It helped me with the frizz although I still have frizz, but for the first use I think it’s ok. The scent is fresh and natural. So far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Harvey

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best hair products I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: People have made comments after washing my hair and using the conditioner - "did you do something to your hair? It is so full and fluffy"... The smell is amazing and lasts. I went on a date and the fellow said..."...your hair smells so good!".... These two products (shampoo and conditioner) smells like peppermint and does an amazing job at making my hair look it's best! I'm totally sold on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo & conditioner ever!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a gentle shampoo & conditioner for my color-treated hair and have tried a variety of different brands with no success. I came across Maple Holistics on accident two years ago and decided to give it a try. I love it! Gentle on my hair, does not strip my color and makes my hair extremely soft. The light mint fragrance invigorates the scalp without being overwhelming. Truly love this shampoo & conditioner!
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Winter Blend - Softness and shine
customer_reviews.text: When I originally bought Winter Blend, I got both the shampoo and the conditioner. I loved them. When I reordered I thought I was ordering the same thing but when I received my order it was two shampoos. I am sure it was my error in not reading close enough, but what I have discovered is that it must have been the conditioner that I liked best. The shampoo is fine, but it was even better when paired with the conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Product that goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Winter Blend shampoo and conditioner for about 4 months and I am still in love with it. At first glance at the bottles I felt disappointed for being so small but after I started using it I noticed that it was so concentrated, just a little drop ladders my whole hair very well so it last longer than any other bigger bottle of shampoo. I love the minty aroma and the tingles on my scalp as I apply the shampoo and than the conditioner. My hair feels soft and aromatic, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Robles

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo and conitioner! I'm 53 with long curly color treated hair. Have used every professional and drug store brand and have never had results like this. First if all I was looking for a product that wouldn't strip color, plus work with curly hair and also nourish long hair and help with itchy winter scalp. A lot to ask in one product. This product came up and after reading reviews decided to try. I still can't believe how nice my hair looks. I get lots if compliments and it works great for itchy winter scalp.
customer_reviews.author: daredevils

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner are amazing!!! I’ve been an avid user of Living Proof for years...well not anymore! I have suffered with a scalp condition called Seborrheic Dermatitis for years and nothing helped!(I have used every shampoo and conditioner on the market...including prescription shampoo!!)After one use...I had visibly less flakes and redness! I also noticed after a couple of days that my scalp wasn’t itchy and cracking open anymore! This is honestly a godsend for me!Bonus...it smells amazing and keeps my hair cleaner longer! Buy it ...you will not regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Ice

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and conditions
customer_reviews.text: I love washing my hair with the natural mint shampoo and conditioner. It helps wake me up and gives my scalp a clean, fresh feeling while keeping my hair soft and conditioned as well as more expensive brands I've tried. Good for my fine hair too.
customer_reviews.author: Anne DeJarnette

customer_reviews.title: Great product that I recommend to any!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost a year now and have found it to help improve my hair and scalp in a couple of ways. First is that my scalp is no longer as itchy throughout the day as before. The prior shampoo/conditioner that I was using was your general brands that you can buy at any store. Second is that my skin was less likely to break out in areas that I used to occasionally have issues. I believe the conditioner oils are better in this product. Third, I appreciate the overall sent which is refreshing. Overall it is a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nirodam

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my daughter because she likes mint-scented hair products. The shampoo and conditioner smelled minty and fresh, and the shampoo was particularly invigorating when massaged into the scalp. It seemed to take a bit more product to produce the desired lather, but overall, we were very happy with our shampoo and conditioner purchase and would use it again.
customer_reviews.author: H. R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this Winter Blend. I especially love the conditioner, and use it year round. The shampoo isn't bad, but I just like the Maple Holistics Hydrate shampoo best. I wish they would break the set up so you didn't have to buy it as a set and could buy the shampoo and conditioner individually. The other thing is that while it smells great when you're shampooing or conditioning, the smell doesn't linger at all on your hair. I would like if it did, but I still enjoy the smell while I use it. Someone else might prefer that the smell didn't linger
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Love the fragrance, hate the bottles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to try to alleviate my itchy scalp. After using it for a month, I think it may have given me some relief so that's a plus. Both the shampoo and the conditioner make my hair feel manageable and soft. The packaging is my biggest problem. The bottles are so stiff and the product is very thick, so I have to unscrew the cover and tap the product into into the palm of my hand. I'm not able to squeeze it out of the cap. I've never encountered this type of problem before. If the bottles were more user friendly I would have given this a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Relief
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this set after having issues with various different kinds of shampoos and conditioners. she usually showers every other day and before using the winter blend set. the shampoos and conditioners made her stomach break out in hives and many other kinds caused her to scratch at her scalp until the skin was raw around the day in between showers. she saw this set and decided to try it out. she says her hair never felt softer, it looks super shiny without looking oily, the mint cools her scalp and relieves any itching. her only problem with the product is how small the bottles are, she would definitely pay more money for larger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: jms16

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have really long and very thick hair and I seem to just keep going back to this brands shampoo and conditioner. Not only do they seem to be very moisturizing and smell great, you also don't have to use a bunch to try to get through my hair. I found that this is product helps keep my hair clean and fresh for longer while also smelling absolutely wonderful. It seems to also help with my bad dandruff that I have as long as I can combine this along with a T gel combination every big once in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Lynn

customer_reviews.title: A Forever Fan
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use, my hair has never felt as natural as it does now. The shampoo feels cool and soothing to dry hair, oily scalp. The conditioner tingles the scalp all over, feels like it is healing from a summer of glaring sunshine, and it leaves my hair bouncy, shiny and youthful. Thank you Maple Holistics for truly wonderful hair products! I am now a Forever-Fan!
customer_reviews.author: Christine L. RICKERT

customer_reviews.title: healthy scalp and hair
customer_reviews.text: Winter months prove to dry out my scalp more due to heating in our house and workplace. This mint shampoo is SO invigorating! I massage it in and the scent and way it makes my scalp tingle helps greatly. Having said this I use it all year round as well. The conditioner trades dull brittle hair to shiny and soft. Maple Holistics is a great brand. Only prob is getting it out of the bottle, recommend softer plastic so it can be squeezed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: If you like minty scent & soft hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very long but fine hair and most conditioners leave a heavy, oily residue in my hair. Also, most shampoos have a flowery scent and I really love the minty scent of the Maple Holistics Winter Blend shampoo! The conditioner softens my hair and it feels light and fluffy. I would definitely recommend the shampoo and conditioner to friends and family! Maybe, some will see them both under the Christmas tree this year :-)
customer_reviews.author: Marina Mayer

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo and Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I am older and have colored my hair for years. I needed a good shampoo and conditioner that wouldn't be as harsh on my color treated hair. I stumbled on this product and decided to give it a try and I am sooo glad that I did. My hair feels softer and better than it has in some time. Thank you for a great product. Give it a try you will see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Gillispie

customer_reviews.title: NO TINGLE 😡
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the “tingling” effect. I suffer from morning migraines and similar brands have gotten rid of headaches. I was so disappointed in this. Although it smells like a candy cane, there was no tingle whatsoever. I don’t know what you people are talking about!!! Waste of $
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Love product!! Got rid of my dry/flaky skin problem on my head after 2 washes!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a dry skin and dandruff problem on my scalp for a long time now! I tried several brands sold in stores but none would completely get rid of my embarrassing and annoying problem. I decide to research online and this product popped up as one of the highest reviews so ordered some to try. I have now been using this for 2 weeks and my straight,dark hair is already a lot softer and NO MORE DANDRUFF!!! Will be buying again after I run out,worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: ~Robyn~

customer_reviews.title: If you want dandruff, use this shampoo!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because it was all natural and was "scalp friendly." The first time I used it, I thought, maybe it was getting rid of the dead skin on the scalp. I used two more times and each time, it created more dandruff. I used my regular shampoo and voila! NO DANDRUFF but a healthy happy scalp. I am SO bummed I dropped $$ on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn McLean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shampoo/conditioner for a guy!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my Gosh! We love this product. The scent is particularly great. I bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it. He loves the mint smell. It actually helps him when he has headaches. The conditioner is incredibly moisturizing. All I can say is if you’re on the fence. Buy it! It’s worth it! Especially if you’re a guy! This is the only shampoo and conditioner my boyfriend will use. It’s also great for a woman. Very versatile, gentle, refreshing, yet moisturizing and revitalizing! This is the good stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have gray hair and it can, at the same time, be a little coarse and flat with no body no matter what I do. I have been using this shampoo and conditioner for a couple of weeks and I love my hair. It is full, soft and doesn't fall flat. It fact the day after I use it my hair is fuller than right after washing it. I love the smell and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: 3 heads say - equal to cheap store brands
customer_reviews.text: lots of great reviews, I fell for it - large price, small bottle - must be good - not really - about the same as store brands for $1.99 - no joke. I am all about natural products and don't mind spending the extra money for good quality but this fell through big time. household has naturally curly hair - a whole other world as those folks know, and 2 glorious heads of straight thick hair, one is colored often. all 3 heads were not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia m

customer_reviews.title: Mintiii
customer_reviews.text: The mintiness was my favorite part about this shampoo and conditioner set. I live in Wyoming and purchased these because my hair was getting so staticy in the winter that it CRACKLED when I'd run my hands through my hair. These products didn't completely help with that, but they helped more than any other product has. I will repurchase this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Helps with dryyyy hair/scalp
customer_reviews.text: I was having such bad dandruff after I bleached my hair (too high of developer), that I had to continually wash my newly dyed hair, and my scalp was still flaky and dry. A friend in class recommended this brand to me, and I haven’t seen or noticed my scalp even nearing flaky. Also makes my hair smell really nice, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: OH HAPPY DAY

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if this is working or not. It's been about a week or two since I've started using it. I also don't wash my hair often - 2 or 3 times a week. I can say, that, it smells amazing. The strong spearmint scent helps my sinuses clear up & it definitely wake me up in the mornings. The shampoo does lather pretty well. Not much is needed to get the job done. The bottles are small. I'd have liked to have bigger bottles for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: The smell burns your eyes
customer_reviews.text: I've bought from this brand before, but another scent and it was great. Thought I would try something new and was very disappointed. It is not as good of a product. Didn't give me soft silky hair and the smell is like tooth paste and event if you don't get it in your eyes it stings. Just don't buy this scent, absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Du Dang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my daughter and husband who both have allergies to sulfates so this works very well. It works so well that when our granddaughter comes to visit who has very fine thin hair, she wants to use it. Hair is soft and looks fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Customer

customer_reviews.title: I kept having friends ask if I just got my hair done
customer_reviews.text: I have 51 year old hair. It went from lustrous to unruly during perimenopause. This shampoo has given me back the teenage bounce and shine. I use it daily. I do notice that after about a week, it seems to build up on my hair giving it a greasy appearance. I just switch to different shampoo for a day or two, and it resolves itself. Doesn't have a strong peppermint odor, so your hair won't smell minty
customer_reviews.author: kateisaredhead

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this shampoo and conditioner!! Previously I have tried just tea tree oil shampoo for my dandruff with no luck. This time I bought this set and added lemograss and tea tree essential oil to it. After just a week, I can tell a big difference. I still have dandruff but no oilyness and better texture. I am going to keep using this and see how it improves over time but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ludlow

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try this product when my last shampoo/conditioner left my hair frizzy. This pair does seem to prevent static a lot better than other products. Besides a nice minty scent he mint oil supposedly stimulates hair growth but I cannot vouch that my hair is growing faster. Cleans my hair well and allows me to only wash every other day. Only downside is it doesn't give my very straight hair volume but I don't think any natural products could to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Phillip Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Left my (very healthy) hair feeling dry and crackley in a MN winter.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great - no doubt - but left my hair (dye-free, 22+inches (growing to donate), thin stands, curly, A LOT of it) feeling dry and crackley. Especially for the oz, the cost was NOT worth the risk of an unproven set in a MN winter (#PolarVortex). So I'm back to playing around with store brands (currently Coconut Curls) until I'm brave enough to try hunting for higher quality again... :(
customer_reviews.author: GHEUER

customer_reviews.title: Soothes scalp, hair falls out
customer_reviews.text: While it does soothe my scalp, this shampoo and conditioner combo makes my hair fall out like crazy. I was also under the impression that the “Winter Blend” meant that it would help against winter hair problems like dryness, lack of volume, etc. From what I can tell, the only wintery part of it is the cooling mint effect, which makes me feel cold and uncomfortable in the shower. I’ve had good luck with other products from this brand, but I don’t think this one is for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily T.

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, great smell and sensation.
customer_reviews.text: A big thing for me in shampoos is ingredients. If it has unnatural fillers or emulsifiers it’s a no go. This one has the right stuff in it. A bonus is Definitely the scent and the exhilarating feeling on your scalp when using this shampoo. I use it for my hair and my beard. One thing I would like to see is these sold in bigger bottles. I go through it pretty fast!
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, clean hair
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I have iih, and head pain is a daily thing for me, this winter blend gives the right amount of help in its blend to soothe. Plus side my husband likes the smell. I use it about every other day. I like that looking up ingredients it is a healthy hair product, and I a big and firm believer in oils . I don't believe you could go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!! A+++++
customer_reviews.text: I seriously cannot praise this product enough. It smells absolutely amazing. The shampoo takes a little long to lather but it definately cleans your hair and scalp. The conditioner works great and leaves your hair so soft and smoothe. The best part about it, it makes your scalp tingle and feels so good. I have long hair and these bottles have lasted me 2+ months and I wash my hair 2 to 3 times a week. A little goes a long way. I will be buying this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin Denham

customer_reviews.title: good smell and for scalp itchiness
customer_reviews.text: This cleans hair well, no residue from either shampoo or conditioner. I have very sensitive skin and this does not effect me. Love the smell. Just wish it was more product for the price...
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: best shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have always looked for a shampoo that does not have many chemicals in its ingredients and I never found a shampoo as good as maple holistics. The difference can be seen from the first washings, I really went super well, that's why when I saw this set I was encouraged to buy it and I can only say that it is amazing it is my favorite because it leaves the hair with a cooling effect and has a very good smell besides leaving it very soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: roberto chirinos

customer_reviews.title: Smells great Dries out processed ends
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Shampoo lathers softly gets rid of buildup Smells amazing Cleans scalp Brings out natural vibrancy/softness Cons: Strips hair too much for my OWN hair type (2b) My hair is also colored. left ends drier then I would like Left hair flatter then I'd like at the roots. I couldn't brush through my hair wet like usual (brush would get stuck so I didn't bother) Overall I'd give it a 6/10 Mainly because its better for your skin/body then commercial products.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: A Good Choice When Used Together
customer_reviews.text: My hair: Fine, thin, color-treated, graying. I like this shampoo and conditioner set. Neither product weighs down my hair. My hair seems to be adequately moisturized and is not dry after use. I give it four stars because I like like a shampoo that can stand alone, without conditioner. I think this shampoo requires the conditioner to be paired with it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Green

customer_reviews.title: Non irritating and makes hair feel nice!
customer_reviews.text: I seem to react to almost everything. I have totally switched to Maple Holistic's. No break outs and my hair feels great. No greasy heavy feeling. No stringy dry feeling. The conditioner doesn't even darken the color of my hair like some others do. Just healthy natural hair. MINE! Love the scents! Super fresh wake you up essential oil stuff that miraculously doesn't darken my red hair. Good stuff and I will be sticking to it.
customer_reviews.author: Hazelephant

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shampoo and conditioner, smells amazing and makes my hair feel soft and healthy. I also love the cooling sensation it gives my scalp. I would recommend this product and I look forward to trying other products they have in the future!
customer_reviews.author: C&A

customer_reviews.title: Real review.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it’s not special enough to justify the price. The bottles are tiny. I’ve been using for a week now and they’re half gone. Speaking of the bottles, the shampoo is so thick, to squeeze the bottle and get anything out you need to be an Olympian. Even my husband has trouble with it. The wonderful reviews come from solicitation by the way with promises of a free bottle. I can’t tell you how much I’ve wasted on mediocre products because of false fab reviews. Either way, it’s a good product but no more special than others with less cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin619

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo & Conditioner EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: In the past year I've really started to read labels and be conscious about what kind of products I use on my hair. I was using another natural shampoo & conditioner that I found on Amazon, and it was okay. But then I came across the Maple Holistics Natural Mint Shampoo & Conditioner and thought I'd give it a try. BEST decision I could have made! It not only smells good and makes my scalp feel amazing, my hair is also healthier and shinier than it's ever been. I would highly recommend giving it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Bauman

customer_reviews.title: refreshing shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the shampoo! It felt really refreshed and clean after using it. However, I wish the conditioner would have felt more nourishing! I didn't feel like I was missing out on moisture, I wish it would have been thicker and creamy. It felt slightly runny and slippery on my hair. I would purchase the shampoo again. Maybe they offer a deep conditioner of some sort? Not sure. The shampoo is worth a try for girls with oily hair though!
customer_reviews.author: Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Good. Not Natural.
customer_reviews.text: After doing a good bit of research trying to find a decent shampoo that is not full of unnecessary ingredients, I found Maple Holistics. From what I could discover, through buzzwords such as "homeopathic" and "hypoallergenic" "BPA & sulfate free," is that this shampoo is no more natural than the other "nature-based" concoctions. Containing several ingredients from many lists out there as "things to avoid in your shampoos & conditioners." There must be a better solution/recipe. With that being said, the stuff is not too bad. Then again, I'm not a super health freak and realize we are all poisoned all the time..no reason to be overly weird about it. Misleading description nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: A Milluh

customer_reviews.title: ? if really 100% natural
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how this is 100% natural when of the first 15 ingredients listed, AQUA is the only one that I can pronounce and doesn't sound like a chemical. However, the shampoo does lather well and seems to do a good job. I do like the mint fragrance whether or not it is natural.
customer_reviews.author: swim mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, good ingredients, smell amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this is my go to shampoo/conditioner. First of all, the smell, oh it's just so delightful! I love mint so it makes me happy whenever I smell it. More importantly, this shampoo and conditioner is fairly clean...no parabens, sulfates, etc. The scent comes from essential oils rather than "fragrance" which could include any number of terrible ingredients. These products make my hair feel light, unlike other sulfate free products that tend to weigh my hair down and feel greasy. Definitely a great product that I will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: emsme5

customer_reviews.title: Not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: First time I used both shampoo and conditioner I encountered no problems with my hair and scalp feeling clean. Then the second time I used them my hair tangled as my hair was drying. Maybe it was because of the weather changing or my hairbrush didn't get the tangles out well enough after it dried.I will try it again soon and see what happens, I purchased the set because of the combination of mints used for the set. My daughter says that the shampoo and conditioner both smell good, perhaps I should have her try them in hopes that maybe it's just my hair that's the problem and not the shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Nana of two boys

customer_reviews.title: From doorstep to shower...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had been working on clearing some land and when we got home I noticed a package on the front porch. These products literally went from doorstep to shower. After reading all the reviews, I was excited to try the Winter Blend shampoo and conditioner. Needless to say, after being outside all day, my hair was in desperate need of shampooing. The shampoo has a fresh minty smell, lathers well and leaves your hair squeaky clean. The conditioner left my hair soft and shiny. Even better was knowing these products were not laden with chemicals. There was also a nice lip balm included with these products (thank you). So far, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: My tween-age daughters and I have been using this shampoo and conditioner for a few years now. Three of us have thin, fine hair that tends to be slightly oily, and mine is also color treated. This shampoo cleans it very well. Although it does have a 'stripped clean' feeling upon rinsing, using the conditioner on the ends does bring it right back to life without making it oily or heavy. Shampoo does lather up very well if you get hair very wet first and then add another quick splash of water once shampoo is applied to the head. We love the smell too!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R.

customer_reviews.title: DRY SCALP? SULFATE FREE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first shampoo that I have purchased after spending around $1,500+ on shampoos trying to fix my dry scalp. I thought I had psoriasis, and or dandruff. Still don't know what I have. Probably bad genes, but this shampoo makes my hair lay differently and it actualyl feels clean. Only down side is that I didn't realize that the shampoo is smaller than I though but that is becuase I didn't read the description I just purchased it because it has natural ingredients and it doesn't have sulfate. I will definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: John Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I read numerous reviews prior to purchasing. This shampoo and conditioner does not make my hair soft at all. It makes it feel like straw and my hair tangled badly.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great to strengthen hair
customer_reviews.text: After getting off of a certain diet, I was having issues with my hair thinning. I wanted to use something to help strengthen my hair and help it to stop falling out, so I decided to use this product. I love the cool feeling the mint gives when I use this product and it has helped the health of my hair immensely. Definitely recommend! I’ve tried the argon oil version of this product but prefer the smell and feel of this one more.
customer_reviews.author: Sammisinger

customer_reviews.title: wonderful scent and nice mint tingle feel
customer_reviews.text: Rarely do I order the same shampoo/conditioner twice because there are so many great ones out there to try. BUT Natural Mint Shampoo and Conditioner is definitely an exception. I've reordered Maple Holistics several times now. It has a wonderful scent and lovely slight tingling feeling because of the mint. I've even purchased as gift because it's so good. My straight, fine hair is left with shine and more body than usual. Definitely my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: ID

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting much more - doesn’t mix well- doesn’t smell like much of anything - doesn’t condition well- and the bottles are small with very bad branding ... won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Heiser

customer_reviews.title: Matted Hair
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. The smell is wonderful, but the shampoo left my hair matted and tangled up to my scalp. I thought perhaps I was using it incorrectly or not giving it enough time to work; however, after over a month, my scalp is sore and my hair is falling out. The conditioner is alright, but it leaves a residue which is difficult to wash out and almost feels sticky if it isn't completely removed. I dont see many people reporting issues, so maybe I wasn't rinsing the product out thoroughly?? This product did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Patel

customer_reviews.title: Winter Blend Shampoo and Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This is a deep cleaning, refreshing shampoo/conditioner set. My family has fine hair and oily scalps; this shampoo and conditioner added a nice fullness that we only get when our hair is CLEAN. Most shampoos have so many added smoothers and conditioners, it leaves our hair looking like it hasn't even been shampooed. It also has a nice minty smell that we all liked as well.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyGiesis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect during Winter
customer_reviews.text: Hands down this has been my favorite Maple Holistics product. I purchase this blend around Christmas/Wintertime. The lather is easily worked up. When shampooing, my head feels tingling and I love the smell of the green tea and peppermint combination. My hair and scalp are left feeling refreshed, not oily but not dry either, and absolutely no dandruff. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shampoo at a good price
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo alone is great, nice minty smell that will wake you up in the morning, gently cleans and rinses free and doesn't dry out my hair, if I decide to not use the conditioner. The conditioner isn't heavy feeling and moisturizes, but doesn't feel like I coated my hair in goop. Overall over a great product at a good price, I will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: PadraicHI

customer_reviews.title: Just loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband as he was used to Bath and Body works Stress relief shampoo and they are not doing it any more. I chose it because it has similar ingredients. My husband absolutely loved both shampoo and conditioner and I sometimes use them too and I also love them! They’re light but refreshing and also the fragrance is very persistent! Would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Lsq

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and gentle on the scalp
customer_reviews.text: This one of my new favorite shampoo and conditioner sets. I usually have to use a little Head and Shoulders because I have a little dandruff, and rarely use any other shampoo. I can use the Maple Holistic's Winter Blend, and it seems to take care of the dandruff, better then the other stuff. The mintyness is refreshing, there might be a small tingle, but doesn’t burn like one would think. It smells great, not artificial, and is invigorating.
customer_reviews.author: SaraFether

customer_reviews.title: Helloooo, Peppermint!
customer_reviews.text: This will be an easy five-star review. I bought these to take on a trip to New Zealand. They were the perfect size and fit right in my toiletries bag. I'd never used them before, but I fell in love almost immediately due to the delightful scent. The shampoo and conditioner were also nice and light on my hair and didn't weigh it down when all we had was water from a solar shower. Natural ingredients, a beautiful scent, and rinsed out easily were all the reasons I loved these. I will certainly order again!
customer_reviews.author: The Dainty Flower

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hair Care Products
customer_reviews.text: After reading positive remarks about this Maple Holistics Winter Blend Shampoo and Conditioner, I decided to give them a try. You know what? They were great!!! My hair looks hydrated and nourished (before it always looked damaged and lifeless). I am very happy since the very first time I used them! (It is going to be a year now!) My hair stays clean and smelling good longer than before! I really love these hair products!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shampoo and conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product twice now I love it so much! I have long curly hair and my hair is no longer frizzy! I put both maple holistic winter blend conditioner and silk 8 in my hair. Let it sit for about 10 minutes and I have had outstanding results! I love the mint smell and would give this brand 100 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca paananen

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!  Makes me hair so soft.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and conditioner set. It smells amazing, a wonderful calming peppermint, that lasts! The bottles last a long time, unlike sometimes when I buy natural hair products I have to use a lot because it doesn’t spread or lather. It leaves my hair ridiculously soft. If you are thinking of buying them just do it. Great price and a great product. I have to tell my husband it’s my special hair stuff because I don’t want him using it all! Definitely a great find and I use it all year long, not just in the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing cleanse
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the shampoo and conditioner include natural products and essential oils. My scalp feels refreshingly clean and cool after a wash. I do have sensitive skin and notice that it is dry and flaky the second day after a wash. I use a natural leave-on hair conditioner moisturizer after the hair wash which helps retain moisture on my scalp. I recommend the shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Ipo B.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo and conditioner because I was looking for something with a Peppermint scent that wouldn’t drag down my hair which tends to get heavy in the summer. I was completely wowed by this scent - very pepperminty while using it and I catch whiffs of it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great but not the best
customer_reviews.text: I do feel this pair helps my scalp issues; dry around the winter time. But I feel they’re not as great as the tea tree combo that I usually use. The tingling sensation is mild compared to the tea tree. Unfortunately it doesn’t make my hair soft. I was hoping it would help soften my hair during this dry season. I guess I’ll go back to my trusted tea tree pair.
customer_reviews.author: LLW

customer_reviews.title: In love with this winter blend shampoo/conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical buying a shampoo and conditioner that I haven’t used before - my hair is really finikey and to be honest I was about done with it and going to cut it off! Based on other reviews I figured I would try this combo out as a last resort before going to the salon-I am really glad I did. The shampoo stripped just enough oil out of my hair so it wasn’t dry by the scalp and the condidtioner did it’s thing and my hair didn’t get all greasy looking on the bottom. I am in love! I actually am going to order a few more sets today for Xmas presents (and another for myself!)
customer_reviews.author: Rue H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing product that really did make my hair feel super soft. I was concerned the bottles were so small that I would go through the product within a month. However, I only need to use a small amount and the bottles have lasted me over a month and still have some left. I really cant wait to try the Sage shampoo/conditioner kit. The Winter kit was so good I just wanna try another one. Last thing I got to say is I am glad it is not like commercial products at local stores that have a bunch of harsh chemicals in them and like that Maple Holistic's is going the more natural route. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle is hard to squeeze..
customer_reviews.text: Really indifferent about the shampoo and the conditioner. Size was a lot smaller than expected and the container is thick making it difficult to squeeze the content out of the bottles. Smell is not overpowering, but it didn’t leave my scalp feeling refreshed. Conditioner still kept my hair dry that it was difficult to comb even with conditioner in the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shampoo & conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It makes my scalp feel fresh and clean. and i don't have dandruff when I use this product! I also love that it so much more concentrated and I need about 1/4th of the amount of shampoo that I use when using Pantene or other common shampoos. 1 bottle of each shampoo and conditioner has lasted us well over 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but weighs hair down a lot
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo and conditioner has a very minty smell and feel when applying - which is personally, the best thing about this product. Unfortunately, it makes my hair very oily and weighs down my hair. It may work for others, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing like a Winter Breeze
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for a great minty shampoo & conditioner. Well if you like a shampoo and conditioner that gifts you a lift this is it. It calms your scalp and refresh's it at the same time. Maple Holistic has done it, best shampoo and conditioner out there.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Shincarick
